__e: - I don't really see what business it is of yours,
It must be something important, for you to ask for our help, M. Poirot?
My God! All I could think of was getting away, Monsieur Poirot.
Monsieur. The key to my room, if you please.
- No, no, no, Monsieur Gale, the daughter did not kill the mother.
- And you, monsieur... I hope this day will bring you the happiness we are all searching for.
The poor Monsieur is in such pain Though the King reacts to the opposite extreme he is finally free
Most of all, it was a hassle with Messire de Molay.
"All his life, Monsieur de Valmont has been and is... "a consummate master of the art of seduction.
That is most useful information, monsieur most useful indeed.
